page.title: 04THE VILLAGE OF HUMBERSTON.
page.content: { Humberston is a large village on the East coast, very close to the urban area of Great Grimsby and Cleethorpes. Although Humberston is nowadays rather a suburban area, there is still a village atmosphere. People are very keen to preserve this atmosphere and there is enthusiastic support for all local events and activities. Facilities in the village are varied:- many good shops,primary and secondary schools,churches,a post office,a library,pubs,garages,and various groups of all ages using the local halls. There are few opportunities for employment within the village. There is an area near the coast developed for tourism,and a small commercial estate. Both areas offer employment but most people travel into Grimsby or Cleethorpes or further afield for employment.
